content: this crochet snowflake is #2 of this year s mini cal the collection of ornaments has wintery names fitting perfectly into the season of cold white snow and festivities explore the list of all free patterns in this post 1 this pattern uses basic stitches worked in the round and is suitable for beginners the finished snowflake measures circa 9 cm 3 54 1 https //crochetpedia com/crochet-snowflake-patterns-2023/
